headline.main: ART SHOW DEPICTS CAREER OF RENOIR; Large Centennial Exhibition of Paintings Opens With Preview Today at Duveen Galleries

lead_paragraph: The large centennial exhibition of paintings by Renoir will open with a preview this afternoon at 4 o'clock at the Duveen Galleries, 720 Fifth Avenue. Composed entirely of loans, it is being held for the benefit of the Free French Relief Committee.
abstract: Free French Relief Com benefit art exhibit, N Y C
